tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"桃木剑","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['{"text":"一把从1.8遗留下的木剑，","color":"gray","italic": false}','[{"text":"按 ","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"}, " 释放的剑气，可以砍断箭矢。"]','{"text":"在面前 1~5 格徘徊，固定伤害为 2 点。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"剑气在夜晚有 0.5 秒的冷却。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"❤ 伤害  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"4.3 点","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"     ❇ 攻速  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"每秒 16 次","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
